1.0.name: wordpress/gray-modern
1.0.description: Light, SEO-optimized, Widgetized, translation ready WordPress theme with modern and details oriented gray design. Perfect for blog. Theme has got possibility to put custom menu in the header and footer. Theme is extremaly easy and fast to install and run.
